JobFullDesc:
We’re looking for a Senior Manager, Product & Technology Insights to drive the creation and maintenance of a strong data culture at Procore. In this role, you’ll partner with leadership to create, communicate and execute a vision and strategy for analytics within the Product & Technology (P&T) organization. 
As a successful Senior Manager, Product & Technology Insights, you’ll leverage your extensive data background to influence planning and prioritization, impact key decisions, and answer important questions about our customers, product, and business. If you’re excited about the opportunity to transform the role of analytics within Product & Technology at Procore—we’d love to hear from you! 
This position reports to our Sr. Director, P&T Operations and can be based remotely in the U.S. or one of our offices located in Carpinteria, CA, Austin, TX, or New York, NY.  We’re looking for someone to join us immediately.
What you’ll do:

Create and execute a vision and strategy for insights and reporting, enabling our teams to drive decision-making, execution, and investments
Partner closely with business intelligence, data engineering, and data science to define data mart requirements and other internal-facing analytics tools
Coordinate across P&T divisions to define and standardize reporting needs 
Surface and solve for reporting and insights needs of internal end-users within P&T org
Leverage data marts created by business intelligence and data engineering teams to create dashboards and gather actionable insights
Query data marts and large data sets to answer ad hoc questions and design and develop reporting assets
Lead and mentor a team of high-performing insights analysts
Partner closely with leaders in Product, Engineering, Ops, Design, and IT to understand the role of data in how we can more effectively drive impact to our customers and optimize our product development process
Advocate for the data needs and challenges of Product & Technology along with leadership, cross-functionally 
Evangelize the importance of a data-driven culture 

What we’re looking for:

4+ years of experience in a management role 
Relevant background in leading and growing high-performing analytics teams
Ability to communicate vision and strategy at varying levels (spanning executive leadership to individual contributors) 
Excellent verbal and written communication skills 
Strong knowledge of and experience with SQL, Tableau, Looker, or similar BI/Data visualization tool
High EQ supporting VPs and Senior Leadership
Very strong stakeholder management skills
Bachelor’s degree preferred, or equivalent work experience 

About Us
Procore Technologies is building the software that builds the world. We provide cloud-based construction management software that helps clients more efficiently build skyscrapers, hospitals, retail centers, airports, housing complexes, and more. At Procore, we have worked hard to create and maintain a culture where you can own your work and are encouraged and given resources to try new ideas. Check us out on Glassdoor to see what others are saying about working at Procore. 
We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome builders of all backgrounds. We thrive in a diverse, dynamic, and inclusive environment. We do not tolerate discrimination against employees on the basis of age, color, disability, gender, gender identity or expression, marital status, national origin, political affiliation, race, religion, sexual orientation, veteran status, or any other classification protected by law.
Perks & Benefits
You are a person with dreams, goals, and ambitions—both personally and professionally. That's why we believe in providing benefits that not only match our Procore values (Openness, Optimism, and Ownership) but enhance the lives of our team members. Here are just a few of our benefit offerings: generous paid vacation, employee stock purchase plan, enrichment and development programs, and friends and family events.
